sentence.japanese: 先生が日本語を教える。
sentence.romaji: Sensei ga Nihongo o oshieru.
sentence.english: The teacher teaches Japanese.

sentence.japanese: 学生は教室に集まった。
sentence.romaji: Gakusei wa kyōshitsu ni atsumatta.
sentence.english: The students gathered in the classroom.

sentence.japanese: 友達が来る予定です。
sentence.romaji: Tomodachi ga kuru yotei desu.
sentence.english: My friend is coming.

sentence.japanese: 未来について考えています。
sentence.romaji: Mirai ni tsuite kangaete imasu.
sentence.english: I am thinking about the future.

sentence.japanese: 毎日新しいことを学んでいます。
sentence.romaji: Mainichi atarashii koto o manande imasu.
sentence.english: I learn something new every day.
sentence.uzbek: Men har kuni yangi narsalarni o'rganaman.

sentence.japanese: 学校は朝八時に始まります。
sentence.romaji: Gakkō wa asa hachiji ni hajimarimasu.
sentence.english: School starts at 8 AM.

sentence.japanese: 友達と会う約束をした。
sentence.romaji: Tomodachi to au yakusoku o shita.
sentence.english: I made an appointment to meet my friend.

sentence.japanese: 午後に会議があります。
sentence.romaji: Gogo ni kaigi ga arimasu.
sentence.english: There is a meeting in the afternoon.

sentence.japanese: 私たちは同じ学校に通っています。
sentence.romaji: Watashitachi wa onaji gakkō ni kayotte imasu.
sentence.english: We go to the same school.

sentence.japanese: 二人が同時に話し始めた。
sentence.romaji: Futari ga dōji ni hanashi hajimeta.
sentence.english: The two started talking at the same time.
sentence.uzbek: Ikki kishi bir vaqtda gapirishni boshladi.

sentence.japanese: その事について話しましょう。
sentence.romaji: Sono koto ni tsuite hanashimashou.
sentence.english: Let's talk about that matter.

sentence.japanese: 新しい仕事を始めました。
sentence.romaji: Atarashii shigoto o hajimemashita.
sentence.english: I started a new job.

sentence.japanese: 自分のことを考えてください。
sentence.romaji: Jibun no koto o kangaete kudasai.
sentence.english: Please think about yourself.

sentence.japanese: 自動ドアが開きました。
sentence.romaji: Jidō doa ga hirakimashita.
sentence.english: The automatic door opened.

sentence.japanese: 大きな会社で働いています。
sentence.romaji: Ōkina kaisha de hataraite imasu.
sentence.english: I work at a large company.

sentence.japanese: 神社にお参りに行きました。
sentence.romaji: Jinja ni omairi ni ikimashita.
sentence.english: I went to visit the shrine.

sentence.japanese: 電車の出発時刻を確認しました。
sentence.romaji: Densha no shuppatsu jikoku o kakunin shimashita.
sentence.english: I checked the train departure time.

sentence.japanese: 日本語の発音は難しいです。
sentence.romaji: Nihongo no hatsuon wa muzukashii desu.
sentence.english: Japanese pronunciation is difficult.

sentence.japanese: その者は誰ですか。
sentence.romaji: Sono mono wa dare desu ka.
sentence.english: Who is that person?

sentence.japanese: 彼は有名な学者です。
sentence.romaji: Kare wa yūmei na gakusha desu.
sentence.english: He is a famous scholar.
